name: Uno Card Game
description:
Try to be the first player to remove all the cards in this awesome four player UNO game! Match cards by color and name in Uno Four Colors! Press the 1 button when you have only one card left in your deck or you’ll pick 2 penalty cards.

Uno Four Colors is a single-player UNO game where you play a match game with 1, 2, or 3 computer AI opponents. The game follows the same rules as your regular UNO game but adds some few twists to the game including the existence of wild cards, skip cards, draw two, and the wild four special card that allows you to change the color and forces the next player to pick 4 cards.

Good luck and have fun!
